alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 330 PM EDT... At 258 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black Point, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Turkey Point, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, Kendall, Homestead Base, Princeton, Richmond Heights, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay, Goulds, West Perrine, Homestead Bayfront Park, Naranja, Leisure City, South Miami Heights and Palmetto Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
